@italiano40 I just recently moved all my music off my MBP and added 4 favorite albums
VBR, bro... VBR. And it might be time to look for another solution. If you're DJing for real with a laptop you might as well get a small/portable RAID.
iOS is now Apple's bread an butter. An absolute cash machine. They could give the devices away for free and still make more money off their App Store commission than selling old school iPods.

I've never needed more than a few gigs of music with me at any one time without docking to my mbp. You could alway save the cash by prepping some smart albums, and syncing those instead? Just a thought :)
Bose Earbuds. Are these the best? Any ideas on where to buy legit one cheap?

As for those iPods and DJing. I presume job needs to create the playlist dynamically, sometimes to set  the mood, sometimes because somebody asked you for Britney.. Still I'd value fast search and dynamic playlist creation which from desktop apps like Winamp, ITunes, Windows Media Player is super easy. How is that iPod Classic coming along?
